# lcod://contract/tooling/resolver/resolve_dependencies@1.0.0

Resolve dependency graph for lcod-resolver. Accepts optional `specSources`
(map of component ids to source descriptors) that is merged with the
normalized configuration before computing the dependency graph.

## Notes
